The founder of Tong Xin Yuan, Zhou Dong (Chen Shucheng), married a beautiful factory worker Li Tian (Louise Li) many years ago. They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 23
programme.desc: At the edge of the Fontainebleau Forest, we visit a museum dedicated to the Barbizon painters. Diane Benoit du Rey paints light on canvas and light fittings. Between textile craftwork, painting and sport, the brand 3. Paradis, cultural fusion. Decorative gilder, there's gold at the tip of elisabeth Bonjean's paintbrush.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 31
programme.desc: The ViaRhona, an 815 km cycle route that sets off from the shores of Lake Geneva, following the Rhone all the way to the Mediterranean. From the Ain to the Bouches-du-Rhone, we meet collectors, sports enthusiasts and nature-lovers, those who cycle for pleasure and, sometimes, those who cycle for work.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 1

programme.title: Il Etait Une Fois... Ces Droles D'objets - EP 45
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'agence Galactique - EP 21
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 20
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 51
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 33
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 34
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 22
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 22
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Etoiles - EP 5
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children. Further explanations from a philosopher and an astronomer help popularize science and envision it as a great human adventure.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 16
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 8
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours - EP 11
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Fal
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Fal'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo - EP 11
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif MondeL'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 2
programme.desc: A focus on the contradictions of the forestry industry and an interview with Louis Pelletier, Quebec's chief forester since 2016.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 12
programme.desc: Emma-ozlem Kaya's father arrived from Turkey in 1972, settling in Chateauneuf-sur-Sarthe, to work at the tannery. A veritable culture shock. Despite the difficulties, the family quickly became integrated. ozlem obtained French nationality at the age of 16 and decided to add a new first name: Emma. She became an engraver.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques - EP 12
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, ''400 millions de critiques'' (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: Les Voyageurs Solidaires - EP 2
programme.desc: French singer and musician Flo Delavega discovers Ibiza, one of Spain's Balearic Islands. Famous for its nightlife, each year this party capital attracts thousands of visitors: a combination of mass tourism and general excess. We meet the ecocitizens committed to preserving their island.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 25
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 24
programme.desc: Chateau de Cadillac, its rich and multi-facetted history bearing witness to France's 17th century heritage. Artist and cabinet-maker, Kostia combines tradition and innovative design. Dries Van Noten bids farewell with a collection faithful to his years of work. From micro to macro-embroidery, Cyrielle Leclere explores the limits of traditional craftwork.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Internationales - EP 10
programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Grand Concours Des Regions - Quel Sera Le Meilleur Chant Folklorique De Franc
programme.desc: Corsican polyphony, shepherd's songs, Breton bagad ... Each French region has its own unique singing tradition. On stage at the Kirrwiller Royal Palace, Alsace, ten groups are in competition. Which will win the hearts of the judges and the trophy for France's best traditional folk singing group?_x000D_

programme.title: Meurtres A Toulouse
programme.desc: What connects the murder victims found in the squares of Toulouse and the words of a Claude Nougaro song? That's the puzzle Commander Simon Keller has to solve. An experienced police officer, he is weakened by his illness, and his partner, young Cecile Gimet who's tackling her first real investigation.

programme.title: La Ligne De Partage Des Eaux
programme.desc: Dominique Marchais takes a waterside walk to explore the emblematic Loire river basin. And asks political, ecological and existential questions: how can we best develop the area in the general interest? How can we modernise without destroying past achievements? How can we live together?

programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Etoiles - EP 6
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children. Further explanations from a philosopher and an astronomer help popularize science and envision it as a great human adventure.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 17
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 9
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 7
programme.desc: Onward journey on the Norman Way between Ireland and France with pupils from a girls' school in Wexford. They go on a school trip by boat to Cherbourg, retracing the steps of their Norman ancestors and discover the tourist attractions of Normandy.

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 32
programme.desc: Australia, an immense country-continent of some 7,690,000 km2. Sophie Jovillard takes us from Sydney to Melbourne, two of the country's most emblematic cities. We meet a population of nature-lovers. Which is hardly surprising given that both cities lie on the coast and are surrounded by nature at its most unspoilt.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag - EP 10
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 4
programme.desc: Friends for nearly forty years, Gaston Lepage and Patrice L'Ecuyer have already travelled far and wide together. This time they've dropped their bags in Sardinia to explore Ogliastra, its history, its traditions and the secret of its inhabitants' longevity.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 25
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Remorques
programme.desc: After having assisted a ship in danger, Captain Andre Laurent takes the passengers on board his vessel. Amongst them is Catherine, with whom he falls in love and who becomes his mistress. As he is about to leave his wife Yvonne, Andre learns that she is seriously ill...

programme.desc: Donjeta Sadiku is a supremely talented boxer with multiple titles to her name. But there is a problem: Donjeta comes from Kosovo, a state whose sovereignty many other countries refuse to recognize. programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: Lagos is poised to become the worlds biggest city. The Nigerian megacity with 17 million people seems like a massive experiment - under-regulated, with endless traffic jams, waterfront slums, a booming economy and an impressively resilient population. We spoke with young Lagosians about their love for the vibrant city and met experts to hear about present and future challenges.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernn Crespo. programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 15
programme.desc: Now in their 4th season in the Premier League, Brentford have established themselves as an astute, well drilled side under Thomas Frank. This week, The Big Interview sits down with the head coach in a local cinema as he talks through the club's time in the top flight. He'll also reveal how he's helped maintain their status with tactical clips of his side's defensive and offensive play.

programme.desc: Man Utd have lost just two of their last 17 Premier League games against Leicester (W10 D5), with those defeats coming consecutively in May and October 2021.

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25 - EP 25
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernn Crespo. From his early days as a striker with clubs like Parma, Lazio, and Chelsea, to his evolution into a title winning coach, Crespo's career has been filled with highs and challenges. We follow his transition from player to manager and join him at Al Ain, where we get a look into how he navigates the pressures and ambitions of managing one of the UAE's top football clubs.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Kruger vs. Yannick Bahati
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a middleweight title fight between JP Kruger and Yannick Bahati. Bonus coverage includes Mark Kamba vs. Mzwandile Hlongwa and Abdul Hassan vs. JP Buys, all from South Africa.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Edison Miranda vs. Willie Gibbs
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Super Middleweights Edison Miranda (26-2, 23 KOs) vs. Willie 'The Gladiator' Gibbs (20-1, 16 KOs) from the Miccosukee Indian Gaming Resort in Miami, Florida, USA. Bonus coverage includes Jason Litzau, aka 'The American Boy' (20-1, 18 KOs) vs. Jose Hernandez (21-3, 13 KOs).

programme.title: Greatest Classics Courage Tshabalala vs. Darroll Wilson
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. From the famed Blue Horizon in Philadelphia, one of the greatest venues for boxing in the world, two heavyweight prospects square off as Courage Tshabalala of South Africa takes on Virginia native Darroll Wilson.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Hakuho, Yutakayama, Kotoshogiku and Abi from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 7: Mexico City, Mexico - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Boxing and the Martial Art of Hands with Masters Igancio Nacho" Beristain and Tiburcio Garcia."

programme.title: MEGA Fights Joe Calzaghe vs Roy Jones Jr.
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Youssef Challouki vs Frederic Berichon
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Sallanches, France, features Youssef Challouki (Belgium) vs. Frederic Berichon (France). Bonus coverage includes Marvin Monteiro vs. Michael Palandre.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: FS MMA Mamed Khalidov vs. Scott Askham II
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 55 in Warsaw, Poland, highlighted by a rematch for the KSW Middleweight Championship between titleholder Scott Askham and challenger Mamed Khalidov. Askham, of the UK and formerly of the UFC, has won five straight contests including a victory over Khalidov via unanimous decision. Now the two are set to run it back again with the Middleweight Title on the line. It's Askham vs. Khalidov, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. programme.title: WCCB Live Tina Rupprecht vs. Eri Matsuda
programme.desc: LIVE November 23rd from Heidelberg, Germany, a championship tripleheader takes place headlined by Tina Rupprecht of Germany and Eri Matsuda of Japan competing for the WBC and WBO Women's Atomweight World Championships. Also on the card will be undefeated World Champion Sumire Yamanaka, also of Japan, defending the IBF Atomweight World Title against Fabiana Bytyqi. Rounding out the card will a European Heavyweight Title clash featuring Oleksandr Zakhozhyi against Arnold Gjergjaj.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 80
programme.desc: The Teletubbies take it in turns to go up and down on the Dup Dup. Sometimes they go fast and sometimes they go slow - even The Noo-noo has a turn!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S6) - EP 19
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'alien', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We meet lots of different aliens - a green alien with feelers from outer space, a quick one and an alien doing a trick.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Lofty's giant sneezes go a long way, so Messy and his friends must help to wash OKIDO clean of all the bad germs flying around!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Bluey teaches Bingo how to use magic so she can make Mum play with her, but she forgets to explain the most important rule: never use magic for cheekiness.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 30
programme.desc: Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Mum must get Bluey and Bingo out the door in time for a playdate, but they can't leave before they finish their game - waiting for a sticky rubber gecko to drop from the ceiling.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.desc: Blasting off in his safari sub, Andy goes in search of the web cam and the Weddell seals.

programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about Butterflies and Moths.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 12
programme.desc: Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up the creatures.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Go Jetters race to fix the Leaning Tower of Pisa, but has it really been glitched?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Glitch and his grimbots have a long race on a very long wall - the Great Wall of China!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 16
programme.desc: When Kenji hears that he must travel home to Japan alone, he gets scared and tries to hide. So, Thomas sets out to find him

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: On a cloudless night, Nelly and Nora help Mrs. Bonner search for her cat Morris.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Pug tries to remember an old nursery rhyme. He and Dog go to a fair where they meet the cat and the fiddle, the cow that jumps over the moon and the dish that ran away with the spoon.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Whilst playing animal races in the backyard, Jeanie tells Monty that all dinosaurs were slow, leading Monty and Jimmy Jones to imagine traveling back millions of years to see if they can find a fast dinosaur.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are having a spring clear out, but when Gran Gran wants to clear out her old jumper, JoJo is distraught - she loves that snuggly jumper!

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 42
programme.desc: When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 43
programme.desc: Bluey wants to help Dad make Bingo's birthday cake, but first she must put away her toys. But nothing can tempt her to clean up, until Dad drops the cake.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 44
programme.desc: At a party, Bingo is desperate to show off her handstand skills, while Nanna can't find a way to make herself useful. They're both feeling a bit lost, until they find each other.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about blending into surroundings.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's Duggee's day off but the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch builds his effigy in ice, his digging threatens the Lambert Glacier in Antarctica.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's Strawberry, who used to be insecure, but now can't wait to celebrate herself and sing her song, See the Seeds!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's the speedy dancing runner beans!

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: Evil Pea asks for flying lessons when Broccoli flies her paper plane into her freezer. Evil Pea doesn't let Broccoli know that she intends to fly high to take over Tato Tower.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: It's the Tin Can Games and Evil Pea wants to win the Tin Can Trophy. She cheats in the final race by putting a magnet on Supertato's back to stop him from going super fast.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 6
programme.desc: When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 7
programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: GrimHQ crashes into the Baobab trees. Can the Go Jetters rescue a baby lemur in time?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 73
programme.desc: The Tubby Car takes the Teletubbies to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Slidey. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po have great fun sliding down again and again.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and follow their dreams.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Plom and his friends want to put on a play for Helping Hand - but what should it be?

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: After a shaky start, the team discovers an easy way to pick apples.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy finds a very dusty sock underneath his bed, but why does it make him teary? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy wants to know how his goldfish friend can stay underwater for so long. He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Monty wonders if it is possible to feel both happy and sad at the same time.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's time to check the weather forecast'. JoJo is determined to slide down the big slide at the park. But rainy weather forecast threatens her plans.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran miss their bus home, so the pair settle down to wait for the next one. But getting the bus isn't quite as simple as JoJo thinks it is.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Shallots have discovered acrobatics and are inspired to put on a show.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 5
programme.desc: Rajiv feels devastated when he loses his crown, thinking that it's the reason he is good at anything, but he soon learns that can still be really useful.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 41

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6) - EP 4
programme.desc: Chef Philip Rolph was besotted with waitress Georgina Henshaw. But Phil realised she was using him for his money, and Georgina bragged to a friend that she was planning to kill him.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou - EP 2
programme.desc: The investigation focuses on a white guy with a white pickup truck. Ann Bryan is found murdered at the St. James Place retirement community. Despite attempts to catch her killer, the case goes cold.

programme.title: First Blood (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: In Epping, New Hampshire, Sheila LaBarre was known as an eccentric widow who loved her rabbits. But her turbulent childhood, a coma-induced vision, and her husband's death sent Sheila on a mission to kill.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: After a night out with friends, vulnerable India Chipchase is lured into a cab by a stranger promising to get her home safely. The following day, her body is found raped and strangled to death.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: City Confidential - EP 15
programme.desc: When a young woman's body is pulled from the ocean off the Big Island, accusations threaten to destroy the local community. As tensions grow, a surprising discovery leads detectives to a devastating truth.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: When a landlord shoots a problem tenant in Florida, police and prosecutors swiftly charge the landlord with murder. The landlord claims the tenant threatened to kill him. Is this self-defense or murder?

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: While in Costa Rica, Patrick investigates the declining population of insects and heads deep into the rainforest to find out just how far and wide this dramatic change is being felt.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: The presenter heads for the paradise isle of the Indian Ocean, discovering its golden sands and historic culture, visiting the fortress town of Galle, a mask making factory and an elephant sanctuary.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather (S5) - EP 3

programme.title: Deadline - EP 1
programme.desc: James Alden is a washed-up journalist making trashy documentaries when he lands the interview of the decade. Natalie Varga is suspected of murdering her rich Hungarian husband and she makes James an offer - find the killer and she'll give him the exclusiv

programme.title: Deadline - EP 2
programme.desc: Oliver went on the run after borrowing from drug dealers in Budapest. Mrs Molnar provides a Hungarian police file which implicates him in another murder attempt. He's officially dead from a drugs overdose and their mother identified the body.

programme.title: Deadline - EP 3
programme.desc: James has a terrifying flight to Budapest where he discovers it's very easy to kill someone on a plane. He manages to evade Toth and Barbara joins him to track down Vera. Vera denies knowing Oliver is alive and threatens to report them for harassment.

programme.title: Deadline - EP 4
programme.desc: James returns to London to pursue the killer but Barbara has fired him from his job and no-one believes his stories of what happened in Budapest. When he refuses to drop the case the police arrest him.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: British crime writer, Martina Cole, examines the life and times of the most notorious female serial killers across history and asks: why do women kill and why are we surprised when they do?

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers

programme.title: Pridelands Safari

programme.title: Side Walk

programme.title: Earth On Edge

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: Our landscape has changed dramatically over the last 50 years.Wild plants, bushes and trees have disappeared, and strange new plants have become familiar.With big, bold experiments and innovative approaches this series offers a colourful and engaging window onto our natural environment and reveals what the future may hold for biodiversity everywhere.

programme.title: Dingo Untamed
programme.desc: Dingo is an award winning Discovery Channel and YouTube Wildlife conservationist and adventurer whose various social media platform reach in excess of 200 million viewers every year. Through these videos, Dingo actively strives to create a lasting connection between people and animals in the hope that this connection can in turn help to save them.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: Why We Run

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: Samurai Drama Selections "Kumokiri Nizaemon 6" Eps. 3 (R)
programme.desc: A story about Kumokiri Nizaemon, a thief-of-all-time and the leader of a gang of thieves, who brilliantly steals an enormous sum of money from the rich by non-violent means without leaving any trace.

programme.title: My Gardening (R)
programme.desc: Learn useful tips on gardening.

programme.title: Go Focus
programme.desc: An up-to-date information on the recent matches of the Go competitions along with easy to understand explanation on the various moves and techniques.

programme.title: NHK ACADEMIA
programme.desc: This is a lecture program in which top runners in various fields as lecturers speak professionally and uniquely on themes that "must be shared now more than ever". What is the "unshakable intellect" that they have arrived at by overcoming the anxieties and setbacks of their youth? Every month, we invite participants to join us for live online lectures.

programme.title: News & Weather (R)
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy English and Meets the World (R)
programme.desc: Children search for wonders worldwide and challenge themselves to communicate with foreigners in English through puppet shows, games, animation, and more. Have fun and learn English naturally with a witch, Kyary Pamyu Pamyu!

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: With Mother (R)
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: Saturday Drama "30 million" Eps. 7 (R)
programme.desc: Sasaki Yuko (Adachi Yumi) works as a temporary employee at a call center, struggling with her mortgage and child-rearing. Despite her overbearing boss and uncertain future, she tries to make ends meet. Her husband Yoshimitsu (Aoki Munetaka) is optimistic but doesnt earn much, which frustrates Yuko and her only joy is her son. One day, a misfortune strikes the Sasaki family, and a momentary lapse in judgment drastically changes their lives.

programme.title: City-Scope (R)
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Tournament Kyushu Basho Highlights
Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 53
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her fathers opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japans fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: NHK Regional Showcases: Terefuku--Fukuoka Human Documentary
Local Exquisite Omusubi
programme.desc: Introducing a variety of Omusubi (rice balls) that can be found in different parts of Japan, with introduction of their origins and ideas of how to eat them.

programme.title: Fun with Okinawa Dialects (R)
programme.desc: Get familiar with Okinawa dialects by listening to folk tales and children's songs.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: HAYAUTA: Songs for Fresh Morning
programme.desc: With musical actor Inoue Yoshio as MC, the show highlights versatile talented artists, from enka and pop singers to musical actors.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: News: Good Morning, Japan
programme.desc: Fresh news and information to start off the morning. Specialized reporters and anchors will wake up the viewers with this live news program.

programme.title: Holiday Interview "Hanatani Yasuhiro"
programme.desc: Interviewing public figures from various fields about their starting point and how it remains etched into their memory.

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date weather information.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Omusubi" Week 8
programme.desc: A Heisei youth graffiti drama, in which the heroine Yoneda Yui (Hashimoto Kanna), born in the first year of the Heisei era, connects people's hearts to the future as a nutritionist. Always cherishing her individuality, she sometimes struggles, but powerfully and joyfully pushes through the turbulent Heisei and Reiwa eras.

programme.title: Living in a Marginal Hamlet: Takinosawa, Yamagata Prefecture (R)
programme.desc: Villages where more than half of the residents are over 65 years old are called "marginal hamlet", and these are now increasing in number throughout Japan. In this program, NHK directors actually live in such marginal hamlets for a month to experience day-to-day life there.

Lee Yeongo is an elite neurosurgeon. He may win recognition from the patients but when he is alone, he feels empty deep in the mind. There is no compassion or emotion for him. Could we think of him as good?

programme.desc: Real-life working travel reality show, Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuanyi lead the "sporty men's working group" composed of foreign sportsmen Kenna, Justin and Uyan respectively on each trip. programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 152
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Bounty Lady - EP 15
programme.desc: Leading Public Affairs Expert HEUNG KWONG-NAM (Dayo Wong), a renowned savior of the bachelorettes in town, often helps his single female clients have a happy marriage by using unexpected methods, yet he himself remains single and is satisfied with short-term relationships.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter - EP 20
programme.desc: Rewind twenty years and an operation causes pediatric trainees Fong Chung-yan (Kenneth Ma) and Hui Kam-fung (Kevin Cheng) to become foes. Fast-forward to the present and Chung-yan is a consultant pediatric surgeon at a top hospital. He and Kam-fung, who is employed by a second-tier hospital, meet up again due to a liver transplant operation. Chung-yan coaxes Kam-fung into joining his elite team.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 94
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, Honey Cave, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 18
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). The brothers join the Intelligence Unit and the Operations Unit of Anti-Terrorist Force respectively, and both gain recognition from their superior SHUM CHI-NGO (Eddie Kwan), which is supposed to be a comfort to their mother. Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 67
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 10
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 7
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 8
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 15
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 18
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Anna in Kungfu-Land
programme.desc: An advertising executive, Kin, launches a martial arts tournament as an advertising campaign for his client. He travels to Japan to invite Shaolin descendant, Anna, to join the tournament. This results in attracting the eccentric masters of other eight sects to join too. As the tournament approaches, Kin and Anna unconsciously fall for each other...

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: My Left Eye Sees Ghosts
programme.desc: May inherits a great fortune when her husband dies, but chooses to waste her life away. After going through an eye operation due to an accident, May begins to see ghosts from her left eye, including a bothersome ghost, Wong. The two team up to help other ghosts and become great friends. One day, May implores Wong to help her instead...

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: La Brassiere
programme.desc: Samantha, the president of a renowned brassiere company, breaks the tradition and hires two guys, Johnny and Wayne, as brassiere designers, and requires them to submit a design for the "Ultimate Bra" in three months. The time is almost up, can those two guys really work out the "Ultimate Bra"?

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Joe loves motorbike racing but is upset with his father as he deters him from the racing competition. In a race with David, Joe is seriously injured and traumatized. His close friend challenges David on his behalf but ends up in an accident and died. Can Joe finally conquer his fear and rebuild the relationship with his father?

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: The Legend Of Speed
programme.desc: A drug dealer, Feng, challenges a ruthless racer, Sky, to a race to take revenge for his brother's broken leg. Sky's girlfriend dies in an accident during the race and Feng also frames Sky for drug trafficking. Sky flees to Thailand to find his long-lost father, a legendary racer, who steers him back on course and rebuilds his confidence.

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: Andy's parents were killed by their sworn brother, Ray, when he was a child. He vows to take revenge and grows up to be a pilot. When Andy hooks up with Ray's mistress, he is being hunted by Ray and flees to the US, where he ends up saving Ray's daughter by chance and falling in love with her. How would Andy choose between revenge and love?

programme.title: Flash Point
programme.desc: Sergeant Ma Jun is a hot-headed cop who vows to take down three powerful triad drug dealing brothers. His fellow officer, Wilson, is an experienced undercover agent working within the triad gang. They both agree to a partnership, but when Wilson's cover is blown, Jun is forced to confront the gang with the only way he knows - his fists.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Protege de la Rose Noire
programme.desc: A legendary heroine Black Rose recruits two young girls, Gill and Sandy, as her successors. Both girls have proven to be courageous and righteous, and she trains them so that they can form the ultimate crime fighting force and become the new Black Roses!

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: This delightful action comedy featuring international favourite Alexander Fu Sheng premiered two years before the American hit Ghostbusters was released. Is it a coincidence? You be the judge as you enjoy this amazing showcase of wushu and wizardry.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty's Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan...

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: A Friend from Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke's daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing's wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his family's declining status. Lin visits his fiancee before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin's bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiance to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - "Twelve Deadly Coins" and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out...

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her...

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!_x000D_Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.
