programme.title: Good Job - EP 10
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Mr Player 15 - EP 17
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: We Are Big Eaters 6 - EP 14
programme.desc: A new chapter of Taiwanese food show! Discover temptations in the form of great food in "We Are Big Eaters 6".

programme.title: Time Concert 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Time Concert 2 continues to return to the rustic natural environment with the concept of back to basics and pure beauty, vividly interpreting the warm power of music art and natural life to enlighten and mingle with each other.

programme.title: James' Going Places 8 - EP 17
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 3
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Mr Player 15 - EP 17
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: Mighty Baby
programme.desc: Lena, Johnny, and Wayne are assigned to develop a new infant product line, "Mighty Baby." With Wayne's fear of babies, child behavior expert Boey is brought in to help. As Boey and Wayne grow closer, Lena's jealousy flares, prompting Boey to leave. Despite the challenges, Johnny and Wayne triumphantly launch the "Mighty Baby" series.

programme.title: Hello, Saturday - EP 25
programme.desc: Helmed by the ever-popular veteran show host He Jiong, this all-new variety show features celebrity artistes from China, Hong Kong and Taiwan participating in song and dance performances, games and more.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 4 - EP 4
programme.desc: In this season, the show takes a fresh twist by inviting 34 diverse guests, who are divided into the Older Brothers and Younger Brothers teams. Get ready for intense music battles, vibrant stage acts, and a blend of camaraderie and competition among the brothers, all shining brightly!

programme.title: Axian Small Town Foodcation - EP 1
programme.desc: Unearthing flavours along the small town trail, Axian Small Town Foodcation is seeking out a trail for nostalgic foodies to follow. Along the way, food is not the only nourishment, the stories and memories that unfold along the way feed the soul as well.

programme.title: The 61st Golden Horse Awards Red Carpet
programme.desc: Widely regarded as one of the most prestigious film awards in the world of Chinese-language cinema, the Golden Horse Awards aims to promote the development of Chinese-language filmmaking, manifest the diversity of regional cultures, recognise the artistic and technical excellence of filmmaking, and expand the global reach of Chinese-language films.

programme.title: The 61st Golden Horse Awards Ceremony
programme.desc: Widely regarded as one of the most prestigious film awards in the world of Chinese-language cinema, the Golden Horse Awards aims to promote the development of Chinese-language filmmaking, manifest the diversity of regional cultures, recognise the artistic and technical excellence of filmmaking, and expand the global reach of Chinese-language films.

programme.title: iWalker - EP 164
programme.desc: Follow bold and witty hosts in hunting down the best gourmet and attractions around the world!

programme.title: Chinese Restaurant 8 - EP 8
programme.desc: This season, the show ventures to Fondation Monet in Giverny, France, with inventive Olympic and Chinese fashion-themed dishes. Unearth new food stories in France's beautiful villages.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 203
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: The Next Singer - EP 12
programme.desc: The show is set to carry on the 'authentic live vocal artistry' legacy of Singer 2024, featuring 24 talented newcomers vying for the spotlight. After three stages of captivating performances, the winning singer will clinch their chance to shine in Singer 2025.

programme.title: The Pride of Hunan Cuisine 3 - EP 12
programme.desc: Explore Hunan's global impact as it breaks boundaries in food and culture. Feel the vibrant and daring spirit of Hunan cuisine in a modern context.

programme.title: The 59th Golden Bell Awards Drama Ceremony
programme.desc: Towards the Future, the 59th Golden Bell Awards unveils a cross-media spectacle, merging cutting-edge fashion with futuristic innovation. Who will seize the ultimate glory? The excitement is palpable!

programme.title: The Next Singer - EP 12
programme.desc: The show is set to carry on the 'authentic live vocal artistry' legacy of Singer 2024, featuring 24 talented newcomers vying for the spotlight. After three stages of captivating performances, the winning singer will clinch their chance to shine in Singer 2025.

programme.title: The Pride of Hunan Cuisine 3 - EP 12
programme.desc: Explore Hunan's global impact as it breaks boundaries in food and culture. Feel the vibrant and daring spirit of Hunan cuisine in a modern context.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 10
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 11
